snippet: A former teacher accused of committing lewd acts on children in what the authorities said he called “tasting games” pleaded no contest on Friday.
abstract: Mark Berndt, a former California teacher accused of committing lewd acts on children, enters legal equivalent of guilty pleas to 23 counts.
lead_paragraph: A former teacher accused of committing lewd acts on children in what the authorities said he called “tasting games” pleaded no contest on Friday.

headline.main: California: Plea on Teacher’s Lewd Acts
headline.print_headline: California: Plea On Teacher’s Lewd Acts
